item.title: A Question about ObjectWeb ASM
item.dc:creator: @joey0101 joey0101
item.description:
@joey0101 wrote:

Please refrain from making any stupid or unneeded comments.

OK, so I’m making an updater in ASM and want to add interfaces to certain classes.

Assuming this code is in the client hook:

ClassReader cr = theCurrentClassReader; ClassWriter cw = new ClassWriter(cr, 0); JInterfaceAdapter jia = new JInterfaceAdapter(cw, "joey/asm/interfaces/Client"); // This is a custom ClassAdapter specialized to change interfaces implemented. cr.accept(cw, 0); jia.visit(...); jia.visitEnd(); byte[] b2 = cw.toByteArray();

Now my question is: How can I copy the bytes produced by my ClassWriter - byte[] b2 = cw.toByteArray(); - into the origional client class?

Any help would be much appreciated.

Read full topic
